title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: Event Step Configuration
description: Background job that subscribes to 'py.feeding.reminder.enqueued' events.

title: Event Subscription
description: Subscribes to 'py.feeding.reminder.enqueued' events to be triggered when pets are created.

title: Pet Update Logic
description: Updates the pet record with welcome notes and next feeding time.

title: Logging
description: Structured logging for feeding reminder job execution.

title: Error Handling
description: Error handling for background job failures.
